name: Elemental Shield
description: Elemental Shield upgrades your Shield spell, empowering it with your selection of Fire, Cold, Electricity, or Acid.  The caster gains Damage Reduction of 5 plus one per two caster levels against the selected damage type.  In addition, any creature hitting the caster with a melee attack suffers 1 to 6 plus one per four caster levels damage of the same type.  The effect lasts for 3 round plus one round per 3 caster levels.
